text: @SpeakerPelosi At the FEB 4 State of the Union Address, @POTUS stated he was addressing the CoronaVirus and your action was to immediately tear up his speech with total disregard for the USA, Neither did the Vile MSM question any concern of Virus, You @SpeakerPelosi & Media are out of control.
